content: In VSCode, I alternate between using lean and lean 4 (i use lean for theorem proving and lean 4 for more general-purpose things), and I find it really annoying to constantly disable one extension and enable the other when using different versions. Is there a better alternative?
Some VSCode hack i dont know of?
You shouldn't need to disable the extensions. Having both enabled at the same time is supported and should just work.
